ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Brown,George Roussos,Henry Boltinoff,Howard Sherman,Howard Sherman,George Roussos,Bob Brown,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Convict Defenders of Space!: Three former space patrolmen convicted of conspiracy are being flown to prison when the transport ship is attacked by the very raider they were supposed to be helping. The convicts stay to help the crew instead of fleeing, and it is finally revealed that only one of them was truly evil and helped to frame the other two.
Aliens for Hire: Shloob from the planet Jorxia tries to get a job with Peters Interplanetary Employment Agency (which matches aliens with specific jobs based on their otherworldly abilities), but all he can do is deteriorate his molecular structure into fluid, and no one has any call for a "melting man."
The Demon Sorcerer of Saturn: When Space Ranger is seemingly killed in a battle with a Saturnian sorcerer, Cryll and Myra have a robot duplicate built to continue the fight. The robot locates the missing Space Ranger and helps to expose the "magic" as trickery.
ComicInfo.Writer: Arnold Drake,Henry Boltinoff,Jack Miller,Arnold Drake,Jack Miller,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Title: The Convict Defenders of Space!; Aliens for Hire; The Demon Sorcerer of Saturn
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
